verses.verse: And it shall be, when <S%H3588><s%> you are come <S%H935><s%> in to the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you for an inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> and possess <S%H3423><s%> it, and dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein;

That you shall take <S%H3947><s%> of the first <S%H7225><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the earth, <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall bring <S%H935><s%> of your land <S%H776><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you, and shall put <S%H7760><s%> it in a basket, <S%H2935><s%> and shall go <S%H1980><s%> to the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%> to place <S%H7931><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

And you shall go <S%H935><s%> to the priest <S%H3548><s%> that shall be in those <S%H1992><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to him, I profess <S%H5046><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> that I am come <S%H935><s%> to the country <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> to our fathers <S%H1><s%> for to give <S%H5414><s%> us.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> the basket <S%H2935><s%> out of your hand, <S%H3027><s%> and set <S%H3240><s%> it down before <S%H6440><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

And you shall speak <S%H6030><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> A Syrian <S%H761><s%> ready to perish <S%H6><s%> was my father, <S%H1><s%> and he went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> into Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and sojourned <S%H1481><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> with a few, <S%H4592><s%> and became <S%H1961><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> a nation, <S%H1471><s%> great, <S%H1419><s%> mighty, <S%H6099><s%> and populous: <S%H7227><s%>
And the Egyptians <S%H4713><s%> evil <S%H7489><s%> entreated us, and afflicted <S%H6031><s%> us, and laid <S%H5414><s%> on us hard <S%H7186><s%> bondage: <S%H5656><s%>

And when we cried <S%H6817><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of our fathers, <S%H1><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> our voice, <S%H6963><s%> and looked <S%H7200><s%> on our affliction, <S%H6040><s%> and our labor, <S%H5999><s%> and our oppression: <S%H3906><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> us forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and with an outstretched <S%H5186><s%> arm, <S%H2220><s%> and with great <S%H1419><s%> terribleness, <S%H4172><s%> and with signs, <S%H226><s%> and with wonders: <S%H4159><s%>

And he has brought <S%H935><s%> us into <S%H413><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> place, <S%H4725><s%> and has given <S%H5414><s%> us this <S%H2063><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> even a land <S%H776><s%> that flows <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey. <S%H1706><s%>

And now, <S%H6258><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have brought <S%H935><s%> the first fruits <S%H7225><s%> of the land, <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you, O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> have given <S%H5414><s%> me. And you shall set <S%H3240><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and worship <S%H7812><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God: <S%H430><s%>

And you shall rejoice <S%H8056><s%> in every <S%H3605><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> thing which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> to you, and to your house, <S%H1004><s%> you, and the Levite, <S%H3881><s%> and the stranger <S%H1616><s%> that is among <S%H7130><s%> you.

When <S%H3588><s%> you have made an end <S%H3615><s%> of tithing <S%H6237><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the tithes <S%H4643><s%> of your increase <S%H8393><s%> the third <S%H7992><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> which is the year <S%H8141><s%> of tithing, <S%H4643><s%> and have given <S%H5414><s%> it to the Levite, <S%H3881><s%> the stranger, <S%H1616><s%> the fatherless, <S%H3490><s%> and the widow, <S%H490><s%> that they may eat <S%H398><s%> within your gates, <S%H8179><s%> and be filled; <S%H7646><s%>

Then you shall say <S%H559><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> I have brought <S%H1197><s%> away <S%H1197><s%> the hallowed <S%H6944><s%> things out of my house, <S%H1004><s%> and also <S%H1571><s%> have given <S%H5414><s%> them to the Levite, <S%H3881><s%> and to the stranger, <S%H1616><s%> to the fatherless, <S%H3490><s%> and to the widow, <S%H490><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> your commandments <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you have commanded <S%H6680><s%> me: I have not transgressed <S%H5674><s%> your commandments, <S%H4687><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> have I forgotten <S%H7911><s%> them.

I have not eaten <S%H398><s%> thereof in my mourning, <S%H205><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> have I taken <S%H1197><s%> away <S%H1197><s%> ought thereof for any unclean <S%H2931><s%> use, nor <S%H3808><s%> given <S%H5414><s%> ought thereof for the dead: <S%H4191><s%> but I have listened <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> my God, <S%H430><s%> and have done <S%H6213><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that you have commanded <S%H6680><s%> me.

Look <S%H8259><s%> down from your holy <S%H6944><s%> habitation, <S%H4583><s%> from heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and bless <S%H1288><s%> your people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and the land <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you have given <S%H5414><s%> us, as you swore <S%H7650><s%> to our fathers, <S%H1><s%> a land <S%H776><s%> that flows <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey. <S%H1706><s%>

This <S%H2088><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%> you to do <S%H6213><s%> these <S%H428><s%> statutes <S%H2706><s%> and judgments: <S%H4941><s%> you shall therefore keep <S%H8104><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them with all <S%H3605><s%> your heart, <S%H3824><s%> and with all <S%H3605><s%> your soul. <S%H5315><s%>

You have avouched <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> to be your God, <S%H430><s%> and to walk <S%H3212><s%> in his ways, <S%H1870><s%> and to keep <S%H8104><s%> his statutes, <S%H2706><s%> and his commandments, <S%H4687><s%> and his judgments, <S%H4941><s%> and to listen <S%H8085><s%> to his voice: <S%H6963><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has avouched <S%H559><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%> to be his peculiar <S%H5459><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> as he has promised <S%H1696><s%> you, and that you should keep <S%H8104><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his commandments; <S%H4687><s%>

And to make <S%H6213><s%> you high <S%H5945><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he has made, <S%H6213><s%> in praise, <S%H8416><s%> and in name, <S%H8034><s%> and in honor; <S%H8597><s%> and that you may be an holy <S%H6918><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> as he has spoken. <S%H1696><s%>
